text: @realDonaldTrump Good TV show, I suppose. You have become irrelevant. State governors covered for your ineptitude for coronavirus, the Senate is covering for your ineptitude on these riots. You are now a lame duck, and we are not even to the election. #firetrump #lameduckpresident @marcorubio
